Text: Moving forward after this weeks tragedyDear Tracy Geaccone All of us at Datek share with the country the sense of extreme loss and shock created by the terrorist events that happened earlier this week It was a defining moment in US history As the time of healing begins Datek joins all Americans in extending our sympathies to the victims and their families and in supporting all efforts to make this country whole again Rest assured that your Datek account and the capital market system is secure and that the assets you have invested with us remain fully protected Datek stands ready to serve your needs when the US equity markets reopen in the next few days On Tuesday we shut down our call center shortly after the New York attacks The location of our Jersey City headquartersdirectly across the Hudson River from the World Financial Centerquickly made us a staging area for the areas massive rescue and resupply efforts Our call center was converted into a location where the rescued or injured were able to contact family and loved ones and we transformed our building into a safe haven for victims of the disaster as well as a command center for hundreds of brave rescue workers Countless Datek employees volunteered to pitch in whenever wherever and however they could Like so many other good Americans they demonstrated their solidarity with the victims and their families by supporting the livesaving and lifeaffirming efforts of local authorities There are a few things that you should be aware of related to your online account with Datek and equities trading in general The US equity markets will reopen on Monday September The ability to place orders in your account will be available well in advance of the market opening All premarket executed orders on September will stand and be cleared All unexecuted day orders placed on September will be canceled All GTC orders will remain good orders until you cancel them Any orders that you cancelled over the phone on September and September may still appear in your account as open orders However Datek will cancel these orders before the market reopens All margin calls due on September will be due when the market reopens Any checks written against Datek accounts will be honored All valid check wire or Funds Now requests made after PM EST September will be paid As always Datek Customer Service representatives are ready to assist you If you have any questions about your account or Dateks capabilities please call us at UDatek or email us at Our leaders have told us that the best way to beat back terrorism is by maintaining our composure and way of life in the face of barbarism We were privileged to be able to play a role as the nation responded to this cowardly attack Datek and our colleagues in the securities industry stand ready to continue to provide for the most respected and stable financial markets in the world We appreciate your patience as Datek the industry and the nation return to normalcy Our thoughts and prayers are with all those affected by these tragic events Sincerely Ed Nicoll Chairman and CEO Datek Online Holdings Corp Legal and Disclosure Notices msaspHBXXX Privacy Policy msaspHBXXX Customer Agreement msaspHBXXX c Datek Online Financial Services LLC Member NASDSIPC CCDA

Datek Gold Same Advantages New Name and NumberLarry Campbell As a preferred customer your satisfaction is our priority We hope you are enjoying the superior level of service that comes with membership in Datek Gold Though it will have no effect on the advantages you receive as a member we want to let you know about our new name tollfree number and email address We also want to remind you about some of the advanced tools Datek offers Datek Gold is now Datek Elite You will still benefit from dedicated Customer Support free Streamerc Level II Quotes and priority status for trying new Datek products and services before other customers We feel the new name more accurately reflects the level of service we seek to provide to valued customers like you Please be aware that our customer contact information has changed New Contact Information Exclusively for Datek Elite Members Datek Elite tollfree numberELITE US Only From outside the US Datek Elite fax Datek Elite email As an active investor you can also take advantage of our advanced portfolio management tools to make the most of any market conditions RealTime Screener identifies realtime investment opportunities based on criteria you select Standard Poors Stock Reports and Fund Reports provide expert market information and analysis And the new Streamerc Portfolio Last Sale and Index features allow you to closely track the performance of your portfolio a particular equity and market indices When you log in to your Datek account you can access all of these tools from the Resources menu at the top of the page We hope you can benefit from these tools and that our service to you lives up to our new name As always we thank you for investing with Datek Online Sincerely John J Mullin President Datek Online Brokerage Services LLC wwwdatekcom PS We want to provide you with the best service you can get from an online broker so please let us know how were doing You can contact us at to tell us what were doing right and how we could serve you better As a Datek Elite member Level II quotes on the Streamerc brand realtime quotation service is available free Datek Online customers who are not members in Datek Elite and are nonprofessional users that trade or fewer times per month can access Level II quotes for per month while professional users can have access for per month You were emailed because you are currently a member of Datek Elite formerly Datek Gold by virtue of trading at least times per month with Datek Online and maintaining at least in assets in your Datek Online account Please let us know if you would prefer these emails not continue mudtkdaspelcampbelenroncom Streamerc is a registered trademark of Datek Online Holdings Corp System response and access times may vary due to market conditions system performance and other factors Datek Online Brokerage Services LLC Member NASDSIPC CCDA
